summary: REQ-13 appears implemented by conditionally rendering a US flag icon for ranks <= 10 in both mobile and desktop layouts of ArtistRow. REQ-14 is only partially addressed because the code references a static asset path, but the required generated flag image file is not shown as added in the diff summary. Additionally, the diff includes references to unrequested theme/background and sample data changes in metadata/summary files.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use a generated static, non-photo American flag asset placed under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced by a stable local path.
missing_requirements.reason: ArtistRow references the asset path "/assets/generated/us-flag-icon.dim_64x48.png", but the diff summary shows no new files added (and specifically no asset added under frontend/public/assets/generated), so the required image is not evidenced as present.
evidence: File diff summary: Added files = none

hallucinated_features.description: Changing the leaderboard/app visual theme/background (e.g., to a light blue mandala background) beyond what is required to display the flag indicator.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest non-goals explicitly disallow changing the leaderboard theme/layout; the diff metadata files describe theme/background modifications not requested by REQ-13/REQ-14.
evidence: project_state.json (summary mentions adjusting UI background to light blue)
frontend-file-summaries.txt (describes light blue mandala background and styling adjustments in multiple files)

hallucinated_features.description: Changing sample artist names/order (e.g., Atif Aslam rank 1, Arijit Singh rank 2).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest non-goals disallow changing existing sample artist names/scores beyond what is required to display the flag indicator; the diff metadata describes sample data changes.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (frontend/src/data/artistLeaderboardSample.ts described as changed with new top ranks/names)
